Requirements The grandmaster has a target grappled or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained]

Effect The grandmaster tosses their target upwards and electrocutes them with a qi-infused double palm strike as they land. The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone], loses the grappled or restrained condition, and takes @Damage[(5d6)[bludgeoning],(2d8)[persistent,electricity]]{5d6 bludgeoning and 2d8 persistent electricity damage} (@Check[fortitude|dc:38|basic] save).
